title: [HIGH-P2] Add missing middleware chains to API handlers
description:
Three legacy API endpoints missing the standard middleware chain for robustness.

Files:
- gleam/src/meal_planner/web/handlers/recipes.gleam:111
- gleam/src/meal_planner/web/handlers/macros.gleam:13
- gleam/src/meal_planner/web/handlers/diet.gleam:15

Required Middleware Chain (on all 3 handlers):
  use <- wisp.log_request(req)
  use <- wisp.rescue_crashes
  use req <- wisp.handle_head(req)

Middleware Purpose:
- log_request: HTTP request logging for debugging/monitoring
- rescue_crashes: Catch panics, return 500 gracefully
- handle_head: Convert HEAD requests to GET responses

Golden Rules Violated: Rule 3 (Middleware & Control Flow)

title: [HIGH-P2] Add JSON decoders for type-safe request parsing
description:

1. Define request/response types for each endpoint
2. Write decoders using gleam/dynamic/decode
3. Replace unsafe wisp.require_json with type-safe parsing

- Type-safe request parsing
- Compiler prevents field access errors
- Better error messages
- Improved documentation
